text: Thrive is a 2015 short documentary film about Matthew Whitaker, a piano prodigy who has been blind since birth.Blind N.J. piano prodigy draws comparisons to Stevie Wonder USA Today. The film was directed and produced by Paul Szynol and has played at festivals worldwide, including North America, Europe, and Asia. The film includes appearances by Jonathan Batiste, Dr Lonnie Smith, and Chad Smith. == References == Category:2015 short films Category:Documentaries about music
title: Thrive (film)
